001package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
002
003import java.awt.color.ICC_ColorSpace;
004
005
006/**
007 * This color space class is based in the "AdobeRGB1998.icc" profile. It only
008 * serves as an example for creating color spaces from ICC profiles.
009 * 
010 * @author WB
011 * @version 2022/11/13
012 */
013@SuppressWarnings("serial")
014public class AdobeRgbColorSpace extends ICC_ColorSpace {
015        
016        private static AdobeRgbColorSpace instance = null;
017        
018        private AdobeRgbColorSpace() {
019                super(NamedIccProfile.AdobeRGB1998.getProfile());
020        }
021
022        public static AdobeRgbColorSpace getInstance() {
023                if (instance == null) {
024                        instance = new AdobeRgbColorSpace();
025                }
026                return instance;
027        }
028        
029}
